docs.lead_paragraph: It seems as if everybody under the Republican Party tent is a presidential contender. Once you've eliminated the ones with sex scandals, there aren't very many left.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two murder cases that have riveted France in the last week came to an end Thursday, with both female defendants sentenced to relatively lenient prison terms.

headline.main: Women Sentenced in Trials That Gripped France
headline.print_headline: Women Sentenced in Trials That Held France in Thrall

docs.snippet: Two murder cases that have riveted France in the last week came to an end Thursday, with both female defendants sentenced to relatively lenient prison terms.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mary Marzano invited me into her Maplewood home to talk about her charitable organization, Green Recoverings, which provides "a good night's sleep for those in need" through collecting and donating gently used linens from hotels. Ms. Marzano's initiative has been immensely successful, showing no indication of slowing down, and I was wondering, with a full-time job as a senior account executive at Vision Creative Group, Inc., an advertising firm,and a baby on the way, how does she do it all? Her comments were slightly condensed.
docs.abstract: A Maplewood woman is helping less fortunate people by gathering discarded but useful linens from hotels and donating them to shelters and disaster victims.
docs.snippet: A Maplewood woman is helping less fortunate people by gathering discarded but useful linens from hotels and donating them to shelters and disaster victims.

docs.lead_paragraph: According to my mom, many women never feel ready to have a baby. Instead, the decision to get pregnant is often one of pragmatism, of not waiting until you're too old, of figuring now is as good a time as any.
docs.abstract: For patients with chronic illness, getting pregnant can mean giving up their days of good health.
docs.snippet: For patients with chronic illness, getting pregnant can mean giving up their days of good health.

docs.lead_paragraph: Painful and recurring kidney stones may occur after bariatric surgery, but the procedure has many benefits.

docs.lead_paragraph: Sex education programs must not deny young people information about sexually transmitted diseases, contraceptives and pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: When asked for advice, Motherlode readers come through, and last week more than 700 of you poured out your thoughts to Emmie, a young woman unexpectedly pregnant as she is about to start a grueling and prestigious Master's degree program.

headline.main: Choosing Not to Keep the Baby

docs.abstract: The young woman who found herself unexpectedly pregnant as she was about to start a grueling and prestigious Master's degree program has finally reached a decision.
docs.snippet: The young woman who found herself unexpectedly pregnant as she was about to start a grueling and prestigious Master's degree program has finally reached a decision.
